contact_resistance.start.description: starting contact resistance; if more than one measurement input as a list of number [1 2 3 ...]

contact_resistance.end.description: starting contact resistance; if more than one measurement input as a list of number [1 2 3 ...]

ac.start.description: starting AC value; if more than one measurement input as a list of number [1 2 3 ...]

ac.end.description: ending AC value; if more than one measurement input as a list of number [1 2 3 ...]

dc.start.description: starting DC value; if more than one measurement input as a list of number [1 2 3 ...]

dc.end.description: ending DC value; if more than one measurement input as a list of number [1 2 3 ...]
